author: dkhaywood
msg: adding support for versioning in in-memory object store (otherwise remoting fails); minor refactorings of ObjectDeserializer - breaking out methods but no change to design

author: dkhaywood
msg: makePersistent now working client/server; renamed ObjectEncodcerSerializer -> ObjectSerializer, and ObjectEncoderDeserializer -> ObjectDeserializer

author: dkhaywood
msg: setSplash has been removed from NakedObjectsSystem

author: dkhaywood
msg: moved responsibility for determining whether there should be a splash screen to the DeploymentType (still need to reinstate override capability from command line flag, though)

author: dkhaywood
msg: tidy up of ObjectEncoder and its default impl (renamed to ObjectEncoderDecoder and ObjectEncoderDecoderDefault respectively) plus its supporting classes: factored out constants; reordered members; made DataFactory a field of ObjectEncoderSerializer so not passed into its methods; renamed the ObjectEncoderDeserializer's methods from restoreXxx to deserializeXxx for symmetry with the Serializer; factored out some common methods in ObjectEncoderDecoderDefault
